EmailTemplate.description: Contract Manager returns the contract request to Requestor if the request is incomplete or for any other reason
EmailTemplate.name: CLM CM Returns to Requestor
EmailTemplate.subject: Agreement Returned for your Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Apttus__Requestor__c},
The {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Name} has been returned to you for further information. Once you have provided the required information, please re-submit the agreement to the Contract Manager.
Required Information: <Reason for return or missing information to be captured>
Click Here to access the Agreement Record.
Thank you!
